summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2937, for the improvement of West and North 50th Street, from existing manhole west of 8th Avenue Northwest to Phinney Avenue and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 35483 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
